fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Orange symbolizes energy, optimism, and enthusiasm. Orange can visit a player to unknowingly make them perform their ability on a second random player, who will never be a Color. They will be unable to differentiate any feedback from their original target and their secondary target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When targeting a Color, Orange may select the secondary target, instead of it being random.
- Orange may only ever target a Color (Primary) role once per game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
